verses.roman:
bhojana samāpta haila, kaila ācamana
sabāre parāila prabhu mālya-candana

synonyms: bhojana—lunch; samāpta—ending; haila—there was; kaila—did; ācamana—washing the mouth; sabāre—on everyone; parāila—put; prabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; mālya-candana—a garland and sandalwood pulp.
translation: After everyone had finished his lunch and washed his mouth and hands, Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu personally decorated everyone with flower garlands and sandalwood pulp.
